abstract: Ahmed Mohamed, 14-year-old arrested for bringing homemade clock to Irving, Tex, school, is awarded full scholarship by Young Innovators Program at Qatar Foundation for Education, Science and Community Development; will move to Qatar with his family for scholarship, which pays for high school and undergraduate education.
lead_paragraph: Ahmed, 14, who was detained after he took to his school a clock, which a teacher feared was a bomb, has won a full scholarship to a science program in Doha.

headline.main: Family of Ahmed Mohamed, Student Clockmaker, to Move to Qatar
headline.print_headline: Student’s Clock in Next Home Will Display Qatar Time

snippet: Ahmed, 14, who was detained after he took to his school a clock, which a teacher feared was a bomb, has won a full scholarship to a science program in Doha.
